entry.title: Picard PO-3-20S - Electric Conveyor Pita Oven - 19.5" Wide Belt, 27" Cooking Chamber
entry.summary:
Vendor: Picard
Type: Bakery Oven
Price: 25334.00

Picard's Pita Oven is electric, cooking up to 1200°F. Product goes directly on a conveyor constructed of solid steel plates, and infrared top elements, as well as interior brick walls, create radiant heat to cook pitas in under 1 minute.

The oven's compact size allows it to easily fit in most kitchens, and it has built-in wheels which make it easily movable. It features an easy-to-use control panel, a removable stainless steel wire mesh entry conveyor, and seed drawers at the entry and exit to allow for easy cleaning.

      • Electric fired oven
      • 700 8" pitas per hour
      • 19.5" wide belt
      • 27" cooking chamber
      • 4 casters
      • Right or left side models available

VIDEO

SPECS

Model Pita
Item PO-3-20S
Dimensions (WDH) 64" x 33.25" x 55.125"
Baking Area 3.65 sq. ft.
Max Operating Temperature 1200°F (648.9°C)
Baking Time Range 30 secs to 2.5 mins
Voltage 208-240V
Phase 3PH
Hertz 60Hz
Amperage 65A
Power Supply 4 wires (3 lives, 1 ground)
Weight 950 lb

WARRANTY

One year warranty.

DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

entry.title: Picard Revolution - Bakery, Bagel, and Pizza Oven
entry.summary:
Vendor: Picard
Type: Bakery Oven
Price: 38214.00 - 46614.00 (36 variants)

Picard's Revolution is a continuous baking type oven with direct-fired radiant heat (not a convection oven). It functions as a bakery oven, bagel oven, and pizza oven, and is available in either gas or electric, with steel or perforated shelves. This Picard bakery oven truly is a "Revolution": it can bake bagels, bread, pies, and pizzas, and many products all at the same time. 

This oven has a compact footprint, an extremely efficient burner system, and is low-maintenance: simple to clean, impervious to rust, and trouble-free to operate. It allows many different products to be baked at the same time, baking everything your customers could ever want when they want it.

      • Single-point ventilation through exhaust canopy
      • Digital control panel
      • Aluminized steel interior walls and roof
      • All carbon-graphite bushings for mobile parts

    SPECS

entry.title: Axis Hybrid - Electric Bakery Convection Oven with Steam Injection - 5 Pans
entry.summary:
Vendor: Axis
Type: Bakery Oven
Price: 4578.00 - 5511.00 (6 variants)

The Axis Hybrid is a full size, electrical convection oven with a five shelf capacity. The overall dimensions (WDH) are 29.5" x 32.9" x 30.1". It comes equipped with a modern digital display and time and temperature controls, as well as ninety-nine different programs with four stage cooking capabilities. It lets you roast, fry, reheat, and much more!

This convection cooker guarantees even heat distribution with a solid 5.5 kW of power generated from the N°2 engine. It has 5 shelves and reversing fans. 

      • Fits five, full size sheet pans
      • Digital display and time/temperature controls
      • Electronic thermostat control
      • Manual mode and program mode
      • Ninety-nine programs with four stage cooking and stage end alarms
      • Core Probe cooking program (with Core Probe Kit included)
      • Moisture injection mode with ten levels and manual injection
      • N°2 powerfull motors
      • Two speed bi-directional reversing fan system
      • "Safe-Touch" vented side hinged door
      • 304 stainless steel oven chamber
      • Five wire oven racks supplied
      • Optional: stand with six shelves

VIDEO

SPECS

Model Hybrid
Dimensions (WDH) 29.5" x 32.9" x 30.1"
Electrical 6.6 kW / 240 V / 5.5 kW / 220 V / 4.9 kW / 208 V
Capacity 5 full size sheet pans

WARRANTY

Two year parts and one year labour.

DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

entry.title: BakeMax - Artisan Stone Deck Oven
entry.summary:
Vendor: BakeMax
Type: Bakery Oven
Price: 7761.00 - 48772.00 (16 variants)

The BakeMax electric artisan stone deck ovens have been designed for high-volume baking, pizza production, and all-purpose operations. They can be ordered in widths from 1 to 4 pans wide, and from 1 to 4 decks high. These ovens are not only excellent baking solutions, but with their contemporary style they can serve as a centerpiece for today's high-end baking industry.

This deck oven is  modular, so the number of decks can be gradually increased as your business grows. Optional proofers and storage cabinets available on the one, two and three pan wide ovens.

      • Heavy duty construction with stainless steel front exterior and high grade steel chamber. Fully insulated with rock wool to prevent heat loss and offer higher performance.
      • Separate steel decks offer the ability to add or remove decks based on your business needs.
      • Heavy duty legs with lockable castors.
      • Adjustable doors with large tempered glass windows offer the ability to view products while cooking and to add a distinct selling point for customer.
      • Power on-off rocker switch for each deck.
      • Digital temperature controllers with temperature LED display and temperature-ready LED indicators.
      • Sensitive K-type thermo-couple sensors.
      • Maximum temperature for baking 572˚ Fahrenheit
      • Holds 18" x 26" full size pans

entry.title: Nu-Vu RM-5T - Electric Bakery Convection Oven with Steam Injection – 5 Pans
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nu-Vu
Type: Bakery Oven
Price: 9076.00

The Nu-Vu RM-5T countertop bakery convection oven gives an even heat distribution throughout the cavity via the fan at the top of cavity, which will blow the air down the inside walls of the cavity and up and out through the holes in each shelf. This will bake your products evenly throughout.

      • Can fit 5 full-size sheet pans with 4 inch spacing
      • Constructed of stainless steel
      • Slam cam handle and cool to the touch dual pane door provide safe and easy usage
      • Small tabletop footprint, only 30" wide
      • Control panel accessible through front and side of unit
      • Heating elements accessible inside of cabinet and through side
      • Solid state controls
      • Indicator light for thermostat
      • Microswitch fan motor cut-off

SPECS

Model RM-5T
Phase 1 or 3
Volts 208v or 240v
Capacity Five 18" x 26" sheets
Shelf Spacing 4"
Dimensions (HWD) 41.75" x 30" x 37.8"
Interior Dimensions (HWD) 22" x 18.75" x 29.75"
Ship Weight 400 lb
Water Inlet 1/4"

entry.title: Nu-Vu QB-5/10 - Electric Oven Proofer Combo - 5 Pan Oven, 10 Pan Proofer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nu-Vu
Type: Bakery Oven
Price: 20874.00 - 22862.00 (8 variants)

The Nu-Vu QB-5/10 features their patented "V-AIR" system which will give you a thorough and even airflow throughout the cavity, so you'll never have to turn pans throughout the cooking process. This oven-proofer is perfect for bakeries looking to make bread, rolls, pies, cinnamon buns, croissants, and more.

You can order this unit with manual controls, or with a touch screen and programmable controls (model QBT-5/10). The oven can hold five 18" x 26" sheet pans, and the proofer can hold ten 18" x 26" sheet pans. Or if you're using 13" x 18" sheet pans, the oven can hold 10 and the proofer can hold 20.

      • Sleek new look
      • Dual pane cool-to-the-touch oven door
      • Optional Touch screen programmable control and Wi-Fi capabilities
      • Best-in-class airflow system
      • Stainless steel construction
      • Heating elements easily accessible
      • Fully insulated
      • Magnetic handles
      • AUTOMIST Proofer
      • Removable drip trough
      • 12 Volt Halogen lights
      • Proofer components on back wall enables easy cleaning of proofer bottom with nothing exposed to water
      • Recessed water filter with easy to change filter
      • Rack cutout toward front allows for removing pans without damaging product

SPECS

Model QB-5/10 and QBT-5/10
Dimensions (WDH) 32.25" x 36.9" x 83.8"
Oven Dimensions (WDH) 18" x 28.6" x 22.25"
Proofer Dimensions (WDH) 18.3" x 28.6" x 33.6"
Water Inlet 1/4"
Ship Weight 700 lb

FREE SHIPPING

entry.title: Nu-Vu X5 - All In One Electric Oven Proofer - 5 Pans
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nu-Vu
Type: Bakery Oven
Price: 24189.00

Nu Vu's X5 is an all-in-one oven proofer combo. Its patented technology allows you to proof, bake, and steam in the same cavity, so you don't have to keep returning to the unit to move product from the proofer to the oven. It can hold up to five standard sheet pans (18" x 26") or up to ten 13" x 18" sheet pans.

The steam functionality allows you to do all types of products, including artisan style bread. The X5 also features a touch screen with programmable controls and Wi-Fi capabilities. Plus with its sleek look and cool-touch door, you'll be able to use the unit in your front of house, which can be a visual way to sell your products.

      • 5 chrome racks included
      • All in one proofer and oven with steam injection
      • Dual pane cool-to-the-touch oven door
      • Easy to use touch screen controls featuring 32 programs with 8 stages
      • Wi-Fi capabilities
      • 5 standard sheet capacity, or 10 sheets that are 13" x 18"

entry.title: Doyon Jet Air JAOP14G - Gas Oven Proofer Combo - 14 Pan Oven, 32 Pan Proofer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Doyon
Type: Bakery Oven
Price: 39888.00

The Doyon JAOP14G is a gas oven proofer combo. The convection ovens can hold 14 standard sheet pans (7 in each oven) and the proofer can hold 32 standard pans. The ovens use Doyon's unique Jet Air System, which will help you bake more evenly, without having to turns pans during baking.

This is a bidirectional air system with gentle velocity air flow for exceptional baking results. This will help your bakery save time, energy, and money. The proofer will give you an even air-flow and a fully automatic humidity system which is plumbed in, so you don't need to fill water pans.

      • Two separate ovens with separates controls for each oven
      • The ovens have digital controls with 99 programmable recipes and a digital timer
      • Proofer has manual controls for heat and humidity
      • Baking temperature up to 500 degrees Fahrenheit (260 Celsius)
      • Has Doyon's signature "Jet Air" system
      • Has a steam shot and pulse injection system for the best baked goods
      • The proofer will give you even air flow and automatic humidity injection for easy proofing
      • 12 pans in oven (6 in each oven); 18 pans in proofer

    SPECS

    Dimensions (WDH) 70" x 53.6" x 73"
    Oven Dimensions (WDH) 25.5" x 29.5" x 28"
    Proofer Dimensions (WDH) 26.25" x 36.5" x 55.5"
    Oven Capacity 14 standard sheets
    Proofer Capacity 32 standard Sheets
    Phase 1

entry.summary:
Vendor: Doyon
Type: Bakery Oven
Price: 19635.00

The Doyon JAOP6 is an electric oven proofer combo. The convection oven can hold 6 standard sheet pans (18" x 26") and the proofer can hold 18 standard pans. You can also order this oven as a side-load model (JAOP5SL), in which case the proofer will hold 9 pans.

The JAOP6 uses Doyon's unique Jet Air System, which will help you bake more evenly, without having to turns pans during baking. It is a bidirectional air system with gentle velocity air flow for exceptional baking results. This will help your bakery save time, energy, and money. The proofer will give you an even air-flow and a fully automatic humidity system which is plumbed in, so you don't need to fill water pans.

entry.title: Doyon 4T - Artisan Stone Deck Oven - Four Pans Wide
entry.summary:
Vendor: Doyon
Type: Bakery Oven
Price: 27139.00 - 81406.00 (20 variants)

The Doyon 4T series of artisan stone deck ovens has a capacity of four 18" x 26" sheet pans per deck, end loaded (or eight half-size sheet pans per deck). Up to 4 decks can be stacked. It has a 1" thick refractory stone deck, with an 8" deck height (it can be purchased with other heights as well, 6", 10", and 12"). It gives you even temperature control from the top to bottom, front to back, for precise baking.

Doyon's stone deck ovens have been designed for the artisan baker. It's the best oven for the bakery that wants to make old-world artisan style crusty bread with thick and crispy crust and an incredibly soft interior. They are also a perfect choice for a variety of quality hearth breads, pastries, cookies, pies, cakes, pizzas, and much more.

It features individual self-contained steam injection systems for each chamber, and electronic control boards for each chamber, which will give you: independent baking temperature and time; independent temperature regulation for bottom, top, and front heat ratio; and manual steam injection for each chamber. For more information on this oven, check out the Doyon brochure. Or to see how much you can bake in a single chamber per hour, check out the productivity chart.

      • Built in one piece with up to four oven chambers
      • Individual self-contained steam injection system for each chamber
      • Four chamber heights: 6", 8", 10", and 12"
      • Chamber capacity of two 18" x 26" pans
      • 1" thick refractory stone decks
      • Digital electronic control board - independent for each chamber
      • Brightly lit
      • Low amperage electric operation
      • Optional 18 pan proofer, or 9 pan low profile proofer
      • Optional eyebrow hood
      • Includes stand and oven cover
      • Models 4T1, 4T2, 4T3, and 4T4

VIDEOS

WARRANTY

Two year parts and one year labour warranty.

DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

entry.title: Doyon Jet Air JA28G - Gas Bakery Convection Oven with Steam Injection – 28 Pans
entry.summary:
Vendor: Doyon
Type: Bakery Oven
Price: 59431.00

The Doyon JA28G is a gas bakery convection oven with steam injection and a reversing 2-speed fan system. It can hold 28 standard sheet pans, (18" x 26"), or it can hold four-strapped bread pans for a total of 112 loaves at a time, or it can hold 196 pies that are 9".

The JA28G is part of Doyon's "Jet Air" series, which is known worldwide for its unique "Jet Air System." The air moves in one direction, stops, and then moves the other way, which results in a bidirectional and gentle velocity airflow for exceptional baking results. This system will help you bake faster and more evenly without having to turn pans during baking. The Jet Air fan system will also save energy and labour costs.

Doyon's outstanding uniform steam injection system includes an electronic timer which will give you a precise mist while baking for a better quality product (crusty breads, bagels, french baguettes, etc.). This advanced steam system will allow inexperienced employees to produce quality products with minimum training.

      • Four oven cavities; great for high volume or baking different products
      • Advanced oven control with 8 stage baking and 99 programmable recipes and USB port
      • Variable air speeds and fan delay; door switch cutoff for fan blower
      • 500° Fahrenheit max temperature
      • Programmable shot and pulse steam injection
      • Twenty-eight 18" x 26" pan capacity (7 per cavity)
      • NSF approved

VIDEO

SPECS

Dimensions (WDH) 72" x 53.6" x 73"
Dimensions per Cavity (WDH) 25.5" x 30.5" x 28"
Capacity 28 standard pans (7 per cavity)
Phase 1
Voltage 120/240v or 120/208v
BTU 260,000 (65,000 per section)
Power Type Gas

WARRANTY

Two year parts and one year labour limited warranty.

DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET
